titleStmt.title: Observations upon Anthroposophia theomagica, and Anima magica abscondita by Alazonomastix Philalethes.
titleStmt.author: More, Henry, 1614-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Parrhesia, but are to be sold, by O. Pullen ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry More, the platonist. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Anthroposophia theomagica and Anima magica abscondita were written by Thomas Vaughan under the pseudonym of Eugenius Philalethes.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

place.placeName: Parrhesia, but are to be sold
